
deregister-image
****************


DESCRIPTION
===========

The deregister-image operation deregisters an AMI. Once deregistered,
instances of the AMI can no longer be launched.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 deregister-image
     --image-id <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--image-id"  (string)
   The ID of the AMI to deregister.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
